CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When PQCDTB and PC71BM were fabricated in a 1 : 1 weight ratio , the open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) , short - circuit current ( J SC ) , fill factor ( FF ) , and power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) were 0.79 V , 5.6 mA cm^-2 , 55.8% and 2.5% , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PQCDTB - This is a material with the abbreviation "PQCDTB".
2. PC71BM - This is a material with the abbreviation "PC71BM".

So, the two materials being referred to in the paragraph are PQCDTB and PC71BM.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. PQCDTB
2. PC71BM

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to a "Material Name".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name", presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Sure, here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties:

1. Open-circuit voltage (V OC)
2. Short-circuit current (J SC)
